alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 3:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF JACKSON COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM CST... At 330 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Vancleave to 15 miles south of Gulf Park Estates. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, St. Martin, Gautier, Wade, Big Point, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills, and Latimer. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 49 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
